Phenomenal,
Portal 2 takes the Portal 1 formula we all know and love and does it again, only better and with more content! The gameplay is a refined version of the first game, only now you can see an outline of were you placed your portal(s) through walls, and you can zoom in the camera, allowing more precise aiming. The voice cast is also fantastic, in every sense of the word. Ellen McLain returns as 'GLaDOS' (and portrays another new character added in the lore, which I will not spoil). Stephen Merchant Voices the all new character 'Wheatly' (A ""loyal"" robotic ""friend""), and I don't know who donsent like J.K. Simmons (voice of Cave Johnson, The founder of 'Apperture Science'). Oh and there's also Joe Micheals (yeah, I don't know who that is either...) who voices the announcer. Also the soundtracks is just as good, if not better than the first games. The last thing I want to mention is that Portal 2 is about 3-5 hours long (depending on your skill), This is excellent, as my only compliant about the first game was it's short length. As well as that, I find that Portal 2 is significant more challenging than the first installment (A good, fair sort of challenge). Overall, Portal 2 is simply incredible.

9.6/10: I cannot stress enough how good Portal 2 is. Do yourself a favor, and buy it (especially when it's on sale)

Extra point: I fell as if this is a good time to mention the portal bundle, which comes with the first and second game, for £1.49 (on sale), you really can't go wrong. I'd even consider buying it off-sale for a full £14.99. You might want to wait for it to go cheap, though.

Portal 1 était excellent bien que trop court, Portal 2 c'est le même en mieux : gameplay plus varié, levels plus grands, histoire plus poussée (et avec plus de personnages), jeu plus long, meilleurs graphismes etc. Rajoutez à ça une campagne coop et un éditeur de niveau et vous obtenez un des meilleurs jeux steam.

Este juego nos trae a Aperture Science de nuevo para experimentar de nuevo en las cámaras de prueba, Portal 2 se podría considerar una total mejora con respecto a lo que fue el primero, cámaras más desafiantes, una mejor historia, un modo cooperativo de dos jugadores, etc. Posee la duración exacta para no aburrir y dejarte con ganas de un Portal 3.
Muy recomendable 9/10.

PORTAL OYUNU GERÇEKTEN GÜZEL BAŞLAYIP DAHA DA İLERİ GÖTÜRÜLÜP PORTAL 2 YAPILMIŞ GERÇEKTEN BAYILDIM EĞER BİRAZ ZEKANIZI ZORLAMAK İSTİYORSANIZ ALIN DERİM

İYİ YANLARI;

1-CO-OP ÖZELLİĞİNİN GELMİŞ OLMASI 1.'DE YOKTU BUNA GELMESİ ÇOK GÜZEL OLMUŞ
2-GÖRÜNTÜLER DAHA SADE VE DAHA CANLI (1'E GÖRE 1'İ OYNAMADIYSANIZ SÖYLİM İYİ YA GÖRÜNTÜLER)
3-SESLENDİRME VE YÖNERGELER TAM YERİNDE
4-EASTER EGGLER TAM YERLİ YERİNDEYDİ
5-ÇOK KALİTELİ TESTLERİ VAR
6-TÜRKÇE OLMASI
7-SES KALİTESİ ÇOK İYİ VE MÜZİKLERİ MUAZZAM (OYUNUN BİTİŞİNDEKİ MÜZİKLERE HASTAYIM YA)
8-DAHA FAZLA MEKANİK EKLENMESİ
9-1'E GÖRE DAHA UZUN VE DAHA İYİ BİR HİKAYESİNİN OLMASI (1.'Yİ BEN 2 SAATTE BİTİRDİM BUNU 5 SAATTE)

KÖTÜ YANLARI;

1-BOSS FİGHT KEŞKE DAHA ZOR OLSAYDI
2-KEŞKE ZORLUK SEVİYESİ AYARLANABİLSE
3-KEŞKE PORTAL 3 ÇIKSA (BİLEREK 3'E YAZDIM ;))

Words cannot describe how great Portal 2 is compared to its prequel.
Words cannot describe how great Portal 2 is. 

I would definitely recommend the game to anybody to anybody who loved the original and would like to experience more of what the Portal series has to offer.

"Portal 2, al igual que se predecesor, es un excelente juego. La historia es, tal vez, lo mejor que tiene, pero los puzzles no se quedan atrás. En Portal, la historia fue muy corta, pero en esta segunda parte, cuando parece que la historia esta a punto de terminar, pasa algo inesperado, y te das cuenta de que solo eso era el principio" 10/10

This is a magic expierience ,  the challenges bring so much amusement , and the humor is magic.   i simlpy love it.. and wish for many more stories and levels,  i dont even care that some maps would be repetitive , just bring more stories..

Portal 2,  seguramente sea un juego con los mejores personajes "secundarios" que se han creados. 

El humor negro de GLados es fántastico, con una interpretación de Ellen McLain sublime.

Las mecanicas que se utilizarón en la primera parte son menos repetitivas y mas intuitivas. 

El juego no se toma en serio a si mismo en ningún momento, no hay mas que fijarse en los videos que te ponen al principio de cada puzzle o en las pegatinas que hay por todo Aperture Science.
Portal 2 is a masterpiece. Challenging puzzle gameplay with a hilarious story and fun co-op. A must play.
Amazing story, will make you think and laugh for sure. Must buy.

Изменений — куча, только Valve не спешит вываливать их разом. Из главы в главу дизайнеры потихоньку переписывают правила, приучая мыслить новыми категориями. Уровни рассчитаны идеально: в меру хитрые, чтобы бросить вызов и растормошить серые клеточки, но без уклона в садизм. В худшем случае вы потратите 15-20 минут на поиски решения, стукнете кулаком о стол и почувствуете себя дураком — ибо ответ лежал перед глазами. В лучшем — порадуетесь, как быстро вы разгрызли еще один кусочек гранита. Portal 2 вообще благосклонна — для каждого многоходового пазла предусмотрены невидимые «чекпойнты»; если допустите фатальную ошибку в миллиметре от победы, вам не придется повторять все с нуля.

I never played Portal, but this sequel is pretty much perfect. Great voice acting, great story, great scripting, great logic challenges, all with more than a touch of humor. This game has a lot of great atmosphere, but it's actually pretty relaxed, with only a few scenarios where quick reactions are necessary.
